Title: Blackstone Original 36-Inch Griddle Cooking Station W/ Hood - 1899
Description:
Key FeaturesConquer the outdoors with this durable steel griddle and mobile cartFour burners provide 60000 BTUs across 769 sq. inches, letting you cook a variety of foods at oncePatented rear grease management system allows easy cleanup and no mess operationTwo side shelves provide plenty of prep spaceIncluded hood secures to the rear of the griddle for protection and easily lifts out of the way when in useGet the Blackstone experience by cooking anything, anywhere, with this 36-inch griddle cooking station. With 769 square inches of space, you can cook for a crowd of any size. Four stainless steel burners provide 60,000 BTUs, giving you plenty of power to cook anything and providing even heat all over. The heavy duty 7-gauge rolled carbon steel griddle plate stands up to the toughest jobs and promises years of use out in the elements. For easy cleanup, Blackstone has implemented their own patented rear grease management system to provide no mess, hassle-free operation. The easy-to-use control knobs provide precise temperature control, letting you create up to 4 temperature zones while also getting you grilling quick with simple piezo ignition. Protect your griddle from dirt, damage, and the weather with the included hood. This hood secures to the rear of the griddle and lifts out of the way easily when cooking. Two folding side shelves provide plenty of prep space, as well as a full length bottom shelf for storage. The steel cart features two caster wheels and two fixed wheels for mobility and a 20 lb propane tank holder. To hold your accessories close at hand, a magnetic strip is featured on one shelf and tool hooks on the other. A cart-mounted paper towel holder offers a convenient way to keep your hands clean, and the bottle opener makes sure you are always refreshed while tending the grill. The 36-inch Blackstone griddle cooking station can be converted for use with natural gas with a separate conversion kit.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Blackstone Pizza Oven W/Stand - 6825
Description:
Key FeaturesCook up to 15-inch pizzas in as little as 90 secondsPizza oven can reach up to 900 degrees FahrenheitPatented 2Stone Technology features upper & lower cordierite stones for even heating & a quick cookPizza oven can detach from base to be used as a standalone configuration or a countertop pizza ovenIncludes aluminum pizza peel to get you started on your pizza oven journey - the cooking possibilities are endlessYou've never seen a pizza oven quite like the Blackstone Pizza Oven. This one-of-a-kind pizza oven can reach temps of up to 900 degrees Fahrenheit and can cook pizzas in as little as 90 seconds. With Patented 2Stone Tech that features both a fixed upper cordierite stone and rotating lower cordierite stone for an even and consistent heating, you'll never have to turn your pizza oven mid-cook like you have to with other ovens on the market. Simply put the pizza in, let it cook, and take it back out, with no need to turn it while it's cooking. This outdoor pizza oven comes with handles on each side and a detachable base, so you can use it as a standalone unit on your patio, or place it on your countertop for another pizza cooking experience. The base features four swivel wheels, so you can easily move it around the back patio until it's exactly where you want it to be. And no need to have your propane tank out in the open; you can store your tank right inside the pizza oven stand. Last but not least, the Blackstone Pizza Oven with Stand includes an aluminum pizza peel that fits neatly into a designated spot on the pizza oven base, so you've got the basics to get started on your backyard pizza pie journey.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Description:

Description:
